item.title: Digest 001
item.description: 文章 神经科学 | Birds do have a brain cortex—and think 原文 This News and Views covers the following two research articles: A neural correlate of sensory consciousness in a corvid bird A cortex-like canonical circuit in the avian forebrain 回忆录 | How I got into linguistics, and what I got out of it 原
